### Description Of Goods And Services
The National Research Council (NRC) requires the supply of a MHz-rate Femtosecond Optical Parametric Oscillator for the Ultrafast Quantum Photonics facility in Ottawa.

### Contracting Entity
#### Government Of Canada
- **Contracting Entity** | [National Research Council Canada](https://nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/index-eng.html)
- **Contracting Entity Address** | 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON K1N 5A2, Canada
- **Contact Information** |

    - **Tel.** | (613) 299-8229
    - **Email** | [roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:roberta.ranaldi@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
